Posts.EditableText:
If the player climbs up a set of stairs (which is an object) and a stair falls out from under them, they will fall and take (amount) of damage.

In QDK what is the best way to set this up?

Thank you!
Posts.HTML:
If the player climbs up a set of stairs (which is an object) and a stair falls out from under them, they will fall and take (amount) of damage.

In QDK what is the best way to set this up?

Thank you!

Posts.EditableText: Edit the roomwith the stairs in it, add command 'climb stairs', print 'you fall down and hurt yourself', decrease 'health' by 5.
Posts.HTML: Edit the roomwith the stairs in it, add command 'climb stairs', print 'you fall down and hurt yourself', decrease 'health' by 5.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks for the help, I just need a gentle push in the right direction and I'll be on my way!
Posts.HTML: Thanks for the help, I just need a gentle push in the right direction and I'll be on my way!

Posts.EditableText: No problem. If you need any more help, don't hesitate to ask me.
